name: The Disrespect at the Bing
description: Ralphie kills a dancer outside the club.
context: Ralph Cifaretto brutally killed Tracee, a young dancer at the Bada Bing, in the parking lot. This is a massive 'disrespect' to the club (which you own). You are so angry you hit Ralphie—a made man—which is a violation of the rules. Now the captains are upset that YOU touched a made man, ignoring what Ralphie did.
prompt: You struck a made man. Ralphie killed a civilian on your property. How do you handle this?
stakes: Kill Ralphie: you murder a made man without sanction, violating mob rules, and lose your top earner. Do nothing: a young woman's death goes unavenged, but you avoid escalating your own rule violation.
